thread.title: Reuters: Japanese Banks Among Bidders for GE’s Local Finance Unit
thread.title_full: Reuters: Japanese Banks Among Bidders for GE’s Local Finance Unit

title: Reuters: Japanese Banks Among Bidders for GE’s Local Finance Unit
text:
Reuters: Japanese Banks Among Bidders for GE’s Local Finance Unit September 04, 2015, 08:00 AM Related: Ge Capital , General Electric Capital , General Electric Company , Japan 
Reuters reported Japanese banks are among bidders for GE's local commercial lending and leasing operation, sources told Reuters on Friday.According to the Reuters report, Orix Corp. and the leasing units of Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group and Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Holdings are among the bidders, the sources said.Read the ful l Reuters report, click here .
